messages.content:
Dear Gen AI Community,

I hope this message finds you well.

I wanted to take a moment to share that I had a very warm and appreciative conversation with Irene earlier this evening to thank her for the contributions she‚Äôs made to our community. Irene brought energy, initiative, and passion to her involvement, and we are grateful for the time and effort she dedicated.

As we continue to nurture this community around shared values of collaboration, curiosity, and inclusive growth, we‚Äôve mutually agreed that Irene will be stepping away from her role. While we may at times take different paths, we remain committed to fostering a culture where all voices can thrive within a spirit of alignment and mutual support.

Please feel free to DM me ¬†if you have any questions. Let‚Äôs continue building something extraordinary together.

Warmly,
Dragana

Dear Non-Coders Community,

We‚Äôre currently going through a brief reorganization to strengthen and continue the important work that has been unfolding in this cherished space. I‚Äôm thrilled to share that Ash and Apoorv will be joining to support this next phase, helping us bring even more clarity, structure, and alignment with the broader Gen AI Global ecosystem.

As part of this transition, we‚Äôll be updating a few key elements and will release the new interest form as soon as possible. Our goal is to ensure the Non-Coders program becomes a seamless foundation leading into the Agent Development Program for Discord 2.0‚Äîoffering everyone a natural, supportive learning journey.

We‚Äôll also be announcing a dedicated meeting soon to walk you through next steps and answer questions live. In the meantime, if you have any doubts or would like to connect, feel free to DM me directly anytime.

Thanks so much for your understanding, enthusiasm, and continued support!

Rodrigo Reyes

Dear @Non-Coders Community,

As mentioned earlier, we‚Äôd like to share a few updates on the next steps for this group. After meeting with <@1360639641556090894>  and <@1335299567440367757>, we‚Äôve initiated a light reorganization to continue building on the incredible work that‚Äôs already been unfolding here‚Äîthis time with stronger alignment to the broader roadmap being led by Dr. Sanchez.

If you haven‚Äôt seen it yet, we invite you to check out the announcement Amber posted yesterday at 3:59 PM EST in the #announcements-community channel. It outlines the Agent Development Class, which this Non-Coders track will now seamlessly feed into‚Äîbecoming a natural and supported entry point into the larger learning journey with Gen AI Global.

To support this transition, we‚Äôre preparing a 6‚Äì8 module learning experience, modeled similarly to AGAI. You can expect live weekly sessions, hands-on assignments for each module, and the opportunity to apply what you‚Äôre learning to real-world use cases. Toward the end of the course, you‚Äôll even get to showcase your tools, ideas, and co-created solutions with your peers‚Äîhelping to shape the course collectively.

In parallel, we‚Äôll continue collecting and organizing community-generated tools, resources, and best practices for Non-Coders. These contributions will be curated into accessible repositories, making it easier for everyone to grow and learn together.

As part of this reorganization, we‚Äôll be releasing a new interest form tailored specifically for the Non-Coders group. Your input will help us personalize this experience as much as possible‚Äîso we‚Äôd love for everyone to fill it out once it goes live.

To give everyone a clearer picture of how this track interfaces with the broader program, please note the following:

The Non-Coders track exists primarily to track your learning pace through multiple data points‚Äîvideo recordings submitted to our repository, your chat interactions, and the Google Form you initially filled out to join the Agent Development Course. The goal is to use this data to place you into the most ideal cohort for the first official stage: Discord Managers. You‚Äôll be matched with others who learn at a similar pace, ensuring balanced and efficient group progress. A team of MIT alumni, working in collaboration with the SGU program and personally recommended by Dr. Sanchez, will be facilitating this data collection and execution to create the cohorts.  

While the Non-Coders course spans 6‚Äì8 weeks with a session per week, we plan to begin onboarding you into the Discord Manager stage within just one week. That said, you can and are encouraged to continue attending the weekly Non-Coders sessions as a supplemental resource even after starting Discord Managers.

Thank you again for your ongoing support, enthusiasm, and commitment to this learning community. We‚Äôre incredibly excited about what‚Äôs ahead and can‚Äôt wait to build this next chapter with you.

Warm regards,
The Non-Coders Team
Gen AI Global

Welcome to Step One: Non-Coding Learners Access Granted!
<@1335299567440367757> <@1360639641556090894> <@1247410151737131009> @darkgago <@1311434218622156850> <@1125194882164736050> @nura775 

Hi everyone! You‚Äôve officially been added to the Non-Coding Learners group ‚Äî this is Step One in your training journey for the 2025 Discord Manager / Agent Development Class at MIT Gen AI Global.

As we finalize instructor placement, cohort matching, and scheduling, this space gives you early access to learning tools and materials, community engagement, and foundational preparation. Your full course begins soon, but this early access ensures you‚Äôre already on track.

Next steps:
    ‚Ä¢    Fill out your Non-Coders Learning Form ‚Äî this will be sent shortly by <@1125194882164736050>.
    ‚Ä¢    Watch for your learning pod assignment tonight at 9:00 PM EST. I‚Äôll be announcing the pairings and creating group chats for each pod.

Get ready to dive in ‚Äî we‚Äôre so excited to start building with you! Thank you for being part of this amazing community @everyone !

Hi <@&1371647540709163130> Team

As we continue building a dynamic and collaborative learning journey together, we want to make sure this experience is as relevant and engaging as possible for everyone. To do that, we need your input!

What tools, platforms, or resources are you most interested in learning about-or even teaching to others?

Whether you‚Äôre curious about a specific no-code platform, have experience with productivity tools, or want to dive deeper into AI-powered solutions, your suggestions will help us tailor the course content and community resource repository. This is also a fantastic opportunity for anyone who wants to share their expertise and support fellow learners by leading a session or creating a resource.

How you can contribute:

- Use the form below to share any tools or topics you want to learn.

- Reach out to Non Coders team if you‚Äôre interested in teaching or co-hosting a session on something you know well.

- Don‚Äôt hesitate to suggest tools you‚Äôve seen or heard about, even if you‚Äôre new to them-this is a space to learn together!

[Here is the form ‚Üí https://forms.fillout.com/t/5ms47yR2fbus]


Your input will directly influence our upcoming modules, hands-on assignments, and the community resource repository we‚Äôre building. The more you share, the richer our collective learning experience will be.

Thank you for helping us create a supportive, resourceful, and inspiring environment for all Non-Coders. We can‚Äôt wait to see what tools and ideas you bring to the table!

Warm regards,
The Non-Coders Team

Hi <@&1371647540709163130> Team,

Thank you for your patience while we locked in a start date that works for all. Based on everyone‚Äôs feedback (and avoiding the U.S. holiday on 26 May), we‚Äôll begin next week:

Group 1 ‚Äì Mondays 16:00 ‚Äì 17:00 EST
First session: Monday, 2 June
Members:

Calendar invites with the video-call link and a brief agenda will follow shortly.

Looking forward to kicking things off!

Best regards,
Rodrigo Reyes

üì¢ Announcement for Agent Development Course Participants

Hello @everyone!

If your name is listed below, congratulations ‚Äî you‚Äôve officially been accepted into the Agent Development Course and will begin your journey in the Non-Coders Track! üöÄ

üóìÔ∏è Timeline Update
The full Agent Development Course will begin one week from this coming Sunday, right after our current Admin Cohort wraps up.

In the meantime, here‚Äôs what to expect:

üîÅ Your Learning Path:
    1.    Start now: Watch the Non-Coders Course recordings, available immediately in #non-coders.
    2.    In ~1‚Äì1.5 weeks: You‚Äôll be onboarded into the Discord Manager Track to build foundational skills in coordination and automation.
    3.    After that: You‚Äôll begin the live Non-Coders Cohort, where we‚Äôll go hands-on with agent development ‚Äî no coding experience needed.

üí° By the end, you‚Äôll complete two learning tracks:
‚Ä¢ Discord Manager Track
‚Ä¢ Non-Coders Agent Development Course

Hi @everyone 

First of all, thank you so much for your fantastic participation and insightful comments during today‚Äôs session! Your energy and engagement made it truly special, and we are excited to keep the momentum going.

As promised, here is everything you need to continue learning at your own pace:

üìÇ **Access Your Group‚Äôs Course Materials**
‚Äì **Group 1 (Mondays):**
[https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1zyNdLys1kQ0wHX2En79m8pIALDOIkvre?usp=sharing]

‚Äì **Group 2 (Saturdays):**
[https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1nHB8Hs8znM4FIDB8W9gUcIQnyuLI5FKo?usp=sharing]

Inside your folder, you‚Äôll find:

**Office Hours Slides** ‚Äì easy-to-follow, friendly learning material,
**Session Recordings** ‚Äì rewatch any class whenever you like,
**Assignments Folder** ‚Äì this is set up with restricted edit access, so only members of your group will receive an invite via email to upload their work. Each class will have its own assignment, released progressively.,

üí° **A Few Important Notes**

1. These assignments are optional‚Äîthis isn‚Äôt a formal course but rather a reinforcement and extension of what you‚Äôve already learned in your AGAI program. Feel free to engage as much or as little as you like!

2. We want this eight-module program to be flexible and shaped by your needs. If you have ideas for complementary topics or tools, please share them‚Äîwe‚Äôre all ears!

3. The goal is to develop a personal, applied project‚Äîwhether that‚Äôs starting something new or improving an existing venture‚Äîusing the no-code AI tools we explore. This is purely for learning and community growth, not for profit. Our open-source spirit guides us all to collaborate, share, and build together.

Thank you again for your enthusiasm, curiosity, and commitment. We‚Äôre thrilled to have you in this community and look forward to watching everyone learn, experiment, and grow‚Äîtogether!

Warmest regards,
The Non-Coders Team
